name: Awee The Game
description:
Awee is a game about a radioactive space goat going through space,in one of his trips, his Jetpack 1000 deactivates, and he comes across a meteor field, his only objective is to survive as long as possible, shooting his D.P.B Door Powered BEAN - Made by Samuel

SPACE = SHOOT BEAN

ARROW KEYS AND WASD = MOVEMENT

THE CHARACTERS HEAD FOLLOWS THE MOUSE

WHEN THE GAME STARTS CLICK THE SCREEN TO START THE GAME.
